content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the function to achieve that:

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(str, " ")
    res = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(res) + length(word) > text_width - 1
            res *= "\n"
        end
        
        res *= "$word "
    end
    
    return res
end
```
Example:
```julia
s = "This is a simple sentence. It will be wrapped to fit within the specified width."
println(wrap_string(s))
```

